name: USkeletalMesh
doc:
SkeletalMesh is geometry bound to a hierarchical skeleton of bones which can be animated for the purpose of deforming the mesh.
Skeletal Meshes are built up of two parts; a set of polygons composed to make up the surface of the mesh, and a hierarchical skeleton which can be used to animate the polygons.
The 3D models, rigging, and animations are created in an external modeling and animation application (3DSMax, Maya, Softimage, etc).

@see https://docs.unrealengine.com/latest/INT/Engine/Content/Types/SkeletalMeshes/

PostProcessAnimBPLODThreshold:
* Max LOD level that post-process AnimBPs are evaluated.
* For example if you have the threshold set to 2, it will evaluate until including LOD 2 (based on 0 index). In case the LOD level gets set to 3, it will stop evaluating the post-process AnimBP.
* Setting it to -1 will always evaluate it and disable LODing.
AssetUserData: Array of user data stored with the asset
AssetUserDataEditorOnly: Array of user data stored with the asset
MorphTargets:
NOTE: BP compiler doesn't support TObjectPtr as an argument type for UFUNCTION so this converting call is
required. For many morphs, this can be expensive, since it needs to resolve _all_ TObjectPtrs and construct a new
array for it.

methods.name: AddSocket
methods.doc: Add a skeletal socket object to this SkeletalMesh, and optionally promotes it to USkeleton socket.

methods.name: FindSocketAndIndex
methods.doc:
Find a socket object in this SkeletalMesh by name.
Entering NAME_None will return NULL. If there are multiple sockets with the same name, will return the first one.
Also returns the index for the socket allowing for future fast access via GetSocketByIndex()

methods.name: GetBounds
methods.doc: Get the extended bounds of this mesh (imported bounds plus bounds extension). USkinnedAsset interface.

methods.name: GetDefaultMeshDeformer
methods.doc: Get the default mesh deformer used by this mesh. A mesh deformer is used to deform the skeletal mesh at runtime

methods.name: GetImportedBounds
methods.doc: Get the original imported bounds of the skel mesh

methods.name: GetMorphTargetsPtrConv
methods.doc:
NOTE: BP compiler doesn't support TObjectPtr as an argument type for UFUNCTION so this converting call is
required. For many morphs, this can be expensive, since it needs to resolve _all_ TObjectPtrs and construct a new
array for it.

methods.name: GetOverlayMaterial
methods.doc: Get the default overlay material used by this mesh

methods.name: GetOverlayMaterialMaxDrawDistance
methods.doc: Get the default overlay material max draw distance used by this mesh

methods.name: GetSocketByIndex
methods.doc: Returns a socket by index. Max index is NumSockets(). The meshes sockets are accessed first, then the skeletons.

methods.name: IsSectionUsingCloth
GetAllMorphTargetNames
methods.doc:
Returns the list of all morph targets of this skeletal mesh
@return     The list of morph targets

methods.name: NumSockets
methods.doc: Returns the number of sockets available. Both on this mesh and it's skeleton.

methods.name: SetMinLODForQualityLevels
methods.doc: Allow to override min lod quality levels on a skeletalMesh and it Default value (-1 value for Default dont override its value).

methods.name: SetOverlayMaterial
methods.doc: Change the default overlay material used by this mesh

methods.name: SetOverlayMaterialMaxDrawDistance
methods.doc: Change the default overlay material max draw distance used by this mesh
